doc.field: Ronald Shiffman collection on the Pratt Center for Community Development
Ronald Shiffman collection on the Pratt Center for Community Development

Documented in this series are the wide variety of training and capacity building programs offered by the Pratt Center over the course of its history. This series includes substantial material on the Center's primary training program, the Community Economic Development Internship. Also included are training programs focused on homeless housing, building rehabilitation, and other topics.
Ronald Shiffman collection on the Pratt Center for Community Development
